lissyrtools 0.2.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Load the datasets for lissyuse, and automatically merge h and p level files based on the variables.

variable_selection_for_lissyuse.Rd

Internal function to load datasets from specified files. Depending on the variable criteria, it loads household-level, person-level, or both datasets. If both are loaded, it merges them; otherwise, it returns the single dataset. The merge stage may be skipped if only one dataset type is required.

Usage

variable_selection_for_lissyuse(
  data_to_load,
  path_to_files,
  vars = NULL,
  lws = FALSE
)

Arguments

data_to_load

Character vector of dataset names to load.

path_to_files

File path where datasets are stored.

vars

Optional character vector of variable names to select. If NULL, all variables are considered.

lws

Logical.

Value

A list containing the data frames selected.
